name: Mushroom Wars 2: Arena
description:
Mushroom Wars 2: Arena is an award-winning real-time strategy game mixed with tactics of Tower Defence and the hero skill elements of a MOBA.

Now you can win Real World Rewards and Cash Prizes (where available)!

Summon legendary heroes with mighty skills that act as generals while you command the mushroom tribe minions. Power up your team with buffs and sneaky abilities to gain the upper hand in breaking the enemy defenses in real-time.

Welcome to the most fungal battlefield action, now download Mushroom Wars 2 and craft your strategy!

If you have any questions about the game, feel free to contact us at support@zillionwhales.com

If you have any questions about the Skillz platform please contact: support@skillz.com
